name: Mole (Nel000)
description:
Mole is a first-person puzzle game, where the player controls an undercover Russian spy in an American institution, on a mission to retrieve a classified document that will greatly benefit their nation.

Features:
  • Oppressive environment - navigate the dark and narrow hallways of a government facility during the night shift
  • Stealth gameplay - avoid the armed guards and security cameras' field of view by finding alternative paths and disabling the cameras´ feed
  • Puzzle solving - follow clues scattered around, in search of keys and codes that will get you closer to your goal
Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Click - Interact
  • Right Mouse Click - Zoom
  • CTRL - Crouch
